import classNames from "classnames" import { ReactComponent as DeleteIcon } from "../../assets/icons/delete.svg" import { ReactComponent as EditIcon } from "../../assets/icons/edit.svg" import CircularProgressBar from "../CircularProgressBar" import "./style.scss" import React from "react" interface Props { readonly task: any readonly taskId: any readonly deleteTask: (e?: any) => any } const TaskCard: React.FC = ({ task, taskId, deleteTask}) => { const { _id, title, priority, status, progress } = task taskId = _id return (
Task {title}
Priority {priority}
{ deleteTask(e) }} />
) } export default TaskCard
